required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

brief_summary.textblock: A study undertaken to investigate mouth leak for airway discomfort/dryness while using CPAP. This study will also measure how much humidification is required to treat subsequent upper airway discomfort/dryness from mouth leak by utilizing different levels and types of humidification.

primary_outcome.description: Will be measured by rhinomanometer or acoustic rhinometry

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of Nasal Dryness and Discomfort
primary_outcome.description: Reported by participants using the Xero Questionnaire

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Aged 18 and over
Exclusion Criteria:
- Inability to give consent
- Currently pregnant or think they may be pregnant
- Current nasal symptoms or chronic nasal disease
- Contraindicated for PAP therapy
